title: Business Cards
marks: Signature of artists Signed by the artists on the front cover, in black
description:
Softcover book with faux wood-grain commercial paper stock cover; black and white photograph collaged to front cover with black paper mounting corners; 21 photographic illustrations and one reproduction of a photograph staped to paper; 32 pp.; Latigo (leather cord) binding. Text in manuscript facsimile,
with date-stamps. This copy: First (and only) edition.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
